thread.title_full: Kids flock to Dubai Marina Mall to enjoy ‘Stories of SpongeBob’Travelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Kids flock to Dubai Marina Mall to enjoy ‘Stories of SpongeBob’Travelandtourworld.com
text:
Kids flock to Dubai Marina Mall to enjoy ‘Stories of SpongeBob’
A large number of kids of all ages and nationalities are flocking to Dubai Marina Mall to watch exciting ‘Stories of SpongeBob’ come to life as part of the on-going celebrations surrounding the 18th edition of Dubai Summer Surprises (DSS), organised by the Dubai Festivals and Retail Establishment (DFRE), an agency of the Department of Tourism and Commerce Marketing (DTCM).
A fun-filled show for the entire family, the ‘Stories of SpongeBob – Live on Stage’ runs until 2 September, with three 25-minute shows taking place at 4:30pm, 6pm and 7:30pm daily. Fans of SpongeBob can look forward to exciting action unfold on stage as many beloved characters from the cartoon series including SpongeBob’s best friend Patrick Star as well as Squidward Tentacles, Plankton and pirates team up to recreate adventures from their underwater world.
Following the show, kids are also rushing to meet the characters up close to take pictures and capture the memories of their unforgettable encounter with SpongeBob and his group of friends during DSS.
DSS 2015 is now in its final week and will conclude on 5 September after offering families from around the world a packed calendar of shopping and entertainment experiences as well as many winning opportunities.
